channel.title: Maven on The Road
channel.description: Recent content in Maven on The Road

item.title: The tips of Maven/Tycho building crossplatform RCP and repository
item.description: I successfully converted our product build from PDE build to Maven/Tycho. Something is worth to be documented here. There are several examples and posts to demonstrate how using Tycho building your Eclipse plug-ins, features, applications and products. The most helpful example is the demo of Tycho project. Below are some traps I met when building my project by Tycho, product build Our product is based on plug-ins, however we added the ‘featurelist’ in build.
